alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kanawha, northeastern Putnam and southeastern Jackson Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 1007 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kenna, or 10 miles northeast of Winfield, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kenna, Kentuck, Liberty, and Given. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 117 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
